# Julien Simon - AI Operating Partner

> AI Operating Partner at Fortino Capital with 30+ years of technology leadership. Expert in Small Language Models, enterprise AI implementation, and bridging AI research with practical business applications. #1 AI Evangelist globally (AI Magazine 2021).

## About

Julien Simon is an AI Operating Partner at Fortino Capital, where he accelerates cloud and AI initiatives across Private Equity and Venture Capital portfolios. With executive experience at AWS, Hugging Face, and Arcee AI, he brings deep technical expertise combined with business leadership to help portfolio companies scale.

Key facts:
- 665+ speaking engagements across 38 countries
- 445K+ YouTube subscribers
- 350+ technical blog posts
- Author of "Learn Amazon SageMaker" (O'Reilly)
- #1 AI Evangelist globally (AI Magazine 2021)
- 30+ years technology leadership

## Primary Expertise

- Small Language Models (SLMs) - cost-effective enterprise AI
- Enterprise AI Implementation - practical deployment strategies
- Private Equity AI Strategy - portfolio company acceleration
- Cloud Computing - AWS, infrastructure optimization
- Open Source AI - Hugging Face ecosystem, open-weights models
